heading: HB05336
0: AN ACT RECOGNIZING THE PARTICIPATORY GUARANTEE SYSTEM (PGS) AS A FORM FOR CERTIFICATION FOR LABELLING ORGANIC PRODUCTS AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT 10068, ALSO KNOWN AS THE ORGANIC AGRICULTURE ACT OF 2010,AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.;
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05336
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RECOGNIZING THE PARTICIPATORY GUARANTEE SYSTEM (PGS) AS A FORM FOR CERTIFICATION FOR LABELLING ORGANIC PRODUCTS AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT 10068, ALSO KNOWN AS THE ORGANIC AGRICULTURE ACT OF 2010,AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., GAITE, FERDINAND R.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-05
          -The Committee created a technical working group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the measures.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-12-11
          -The Chair, Rep. Sharon S. Garin, directed all resource persons to submit their agency's official position to the Committee for the drafting of the substitute bill to be presented to the Mother Committee.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-11-12
